snippet: Eric Asimov reviews five of his favorite new wine books.
abstract: Eric Asimov The Pour column reviews books Barolo and Barbaresco: The King and Queen of Italian Wines by Kerin O'Keefe, An Unlikely Vineyard: The Education of a Farmer and Her Quest for Terroir by Deirdre Heekin, Natural Wine: An Introduction to Organic and Biodynamic Wines Made Naturally by Isabelle Legeron, Shadows in the Vineyard: The True Story of the Plot to Poison the World's Greatest Wine by Maximilian Potter and Sherry: A Modern Guide to the Wine World's Best-Kept Secret by Taila Baiocchi.
lead_paragraph: Eric Asimov reviews five of his favorite new wine books.
